code: import{useState}from"react";import{excludeObjectKey}from"../utils/excludeObjectKey";export function usePhoneBook(){const[phoneBook,setPhoneBook]=useState({});function getNumber(name){if(!name){return'invalid';}if(!phoneBook[name]){return'Этого имени нет';}return phoneBook[name];}function setNumber(name,number){if(!name||!number){return'invalid';}setPhoneBook({...phoneBook,[name]:number});if(phoneBook[name]===number){return'Такой номер уже есть';}if(phoneBook[name]!==undefined){return'Номер изменен';}return'Имя добавлено';}function deleteNumber(name){if(!name){return'invalid';}if(!phoneBook[name]){return'Этого имени нет';}setPhoneBook(phoneBook=>excludeObjectKey(phoneBook,name));return"Имя удалено";}return{getNumber,setNumber,deleteNumber,phoneBook};}export function handleCommand(command,phoneBook){if(command===null){return"Invalid";}const tokens=command.split(" ");const op=tokens[0];if(op==='get'){return phoneBook.getNumber(tokens[1]);}else if(op==='set'){return phoneBook.setNumber(tokens[1],tokens[2]);}else if(op==='delete'){return phoneBook.deleteNumber(tokens[1]);}else{return"Invalid";}}
